publishedfiledetails.title: Advanced Engram Unlocker
publishedfiledetails.description:
[img]https://steamuserimages-a.akamaihd.net/ugc/915795171124816171/A557F166E54D290A0954E8D84C115D34EF47EEF4/[/img]
[b]AUTOMATICALLY unlock Engrams at and below your character's level while you play! You don't have to do anything! You can also choose what Engram Groups you would like to have unlocked using the INI Options.[/b]
